name: El Fin Del Tiempo
overview:
El Fin Del Tiempo was produced by Niemer S.A in 1981.

The End of Time is an original video game designed and manufactured by Niemer , a company owned by Enrique Zarco and Jose Maria Arribas .

The homologation record dates from 1981 and in this same year advertisements appeared in the specialized press. The machine was also presented at the SADA'81 arcade fair as a type "A" novelty along with a type "B" (Aries) machine.

The game was also featured at international fairs. Niemer exhibited two video machines of his own design at the ATE'82: The End of Time and 4 online , an event that was held in January 1982 in Birmingham, England, with the aim of reaching agreements with foreign manufacturers.

The End of Time consists of several screens that include different game perspectives, and possibly as they are deduced from the markers, we had a limited time to complete each level.
